name: Priyanka
intro: Stockholm-based frontend developer studying at <0>Hyper Island</0> and currently interning at <0>Swirl</0>. At Swirl, I contributed to <1>Haus</1>, a financial health web app built with <0>Next.js</0>, <0>Neon</0>, and <0>Vercel</0>. I love building modern, user-focused interfaces with <0>React</0> and <0>TypeScript</0>, and I am starting to build mobile UIs with <0>Flutter</0>.
focusDescription: Improving Haus in production, learning Flutter by adding new screens to my first mobile app, and deepening my experience with Next.js, TypeScript, and modern deployment tools like Vercel and Neon.
